Actions.Name: Dissonant Bolt
Actions.Effect: Teleport any character in the area to any point on the line. Electrified characters can be teleported 2 in any direction.

Actions.Name: Flash Step
Actions.Description: Teleport 3, then deal 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 3.

Actions.Name: Crackling Wall
Actions.Description: The Rift Dancer creates a line 3 dangerous terrain effect in range 4.
